original: "...and remember: Do the math. Your life depends on it. If you have 30 rounds in a rifle, you can take down maybe 10 zombies with it if you're a good shot... and lucky. Can you kill one of those things with 3 rounds?"
translation: “……记住：要多算。你的生死取决于此。如果你的步枪有30发子弹，若你是一个不错的射手……且足够幸运，也许可以干掉10个丧尸。但你能用3发子弹杀死一个吗？”
context:
ID: undefined
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/More_Survivor_Notes/snippets.json
类型为 snippet

https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#More_Survivor_Notes→snippet→[0]

original: "Always plan ahead, never sleep in a place that has only one exit. Lost a good friend to a bad decision."
translation: “提前计划好，永远不要在只有一个出口的地方休息。不要因为错误的决定而失去真诚的朋友。”
context:
ID: undefined
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/More_Survivor_Notes/snippets.json

original: "Dad said something about a bear trap and a tear gas grenade. I... I think he's going to trap and gas that freak moose out on the street. It'll give us meat for weeks if we use the dehydrator. He hasn't come back though..."
translation: “爸爸给我讲了一些捕熊陷阱和催泪弹的事情。我……我以为他会用催泪弹把那只恐怖的驼鹿逼到路上再用陷阱抓住它。用食物脱水机脱过水后，就能给我们带来足够几个星期的肉。但他没有回来……”
context:
ID: undefined

original: "Honey, we're going to hole up in the garage for a day before we make a break for it out of the city. If we try to plow through the horde, I fear the car won't stand ten seconds. I'm going to move the engine to the back, and maybe the fuel tank too... add some plating to the front... Maybe reinforce the windows. The modifications are going to take at least a day. Find my caffeine pills. I may not get any sleep in the next 36 hours."
translation: “亲爱的，我们要在车库里躲上一天，然后才能逃出城去。如果我们试图穿过人群，我想车子撑不过十秒钟。我要把引擎移到后面，也许油箱也是……在前面加些装甲板……也许车窗也要加固。改装至少需要一天时间。找下我的咖啡因药片，在接下来的36个小时里我可能一刻也不能休息。”
context:
ID: undefined
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/More_Survivor_Notes/snippets.json

original: "If you're planning on using a building for a temporary stash, might be a good idea to open and close the windows. Sure, having unlocked windows might seem unsafe, but if I'm trying to sneak back in while some Zed's are wandering near the door, you'll thank me later for the quiet entrance."
translation: “如果你打算将一栋建筑作为临时藏身处，选择性地打开一些窗户也许是个不错的主意。诚然，打开窗户似乎不很安全，但如果你想趁丧尸在门口闲逛的时候安静地溜回去，你会感谢我的。”

original: "Lindsay, meet us at Jason's house. Jason, the nut that he is, is going to set it on fire at midnight before we all make a break for it. He's convinced the monsters aren't afraid of fire, but DRAWN to it. If it works it's at least going to make one giant distraction. Let's hope it'll clear the entire block."
translation: “林赛，在杰森家与我们会合。杰森，这个疯子，他打算在午夜休息之前将房子点燃。他确信怪物不怕火，但被火吸引。如果是这样，至少会将怪物吸引住。希望它能清除整个街区。”

original: It reads 'I don't know if we each have a destiny, or if we're all just floatin' around accidental-like on a breeze, but I, I think maybe it's both. Maybe both is happenin' at the same time. I mid'ha ate too many of them hallucina'gan mushroms.'
translation: 上面写着“我不知道我们每个人是否都有自己的命运，或我们是否只是在随风飘荡，充满了不确定性，但对于我，我想也许两者都有。也许两者同时发生。我大概是吃太多致幻蘑菇了。”

original: It reads 'I keep having the same dream over and over: here I am slaughtering this electrified zombie, heaps of flesh gouged out, putrified goo and parts filling my hands, slopping against my clothes and face. I can feel the sweat pouring down my cheeks and my back, and every time I pull out some sort of burnt out bionic. Sometimes I find a battery, or if I'm really lucky, I'll find some really extravagant gizmo and I wake up from the dream.'
translation: 上面写着“我反复地做着同一个梦：梦里，我正在屠杀这个带电的丧尸，一堆堆肉被挖出来，腐烂的粘液和器官沾满了我的双手，也溅在我的衣服和脸上。从中拿出某个烧坏了的生化插件的那一刻，我都能感觉到汗水从我的脸颊和背部倾泻而下。有时我会找到一个储能模块，或者如果真的有够幸运的话，我会找到一些非常奢侈的小玩意儿，接着我就梦中醒来了。”
context:
ID: undefined

original: It reads 'I was a chattin' with a man a whiles ago, he was a nic-a person. He'd a yell "Run Forest! Run, and never stop a-runnin". ' [It seems like a page out of a diary, but the rest unlegible.]
translation: 上面写着“我刚才和一个男人聊天”，他是一个nic-a人。然后这些骑自行车的人来追我，我一个接一个地跑，但后来我觉得有什么东西跳起来咬我，我大声喊叫。我想那个尼克人是支持我的。他会大叫“快跑森林！快跑，永远不要停下来[这看起来像是日记中的一页，但其余的都记不住了。]

original: It reads 'There was a man who I met today, he told me his name was Forest.  He talked funny, just after we got acquainted a group of people on bikes came by and he started a' runnin'.  I don't know why but I got this urge to yell, so I did. I yelled "Run Forest! Run!" at the top of my lungs.  Just then after I finished yellin' I saw one of them pull out a rifle of sorts and shoot his right in the ass, I heard him yell "Somethin' dun' jumped up and bit me!".  That was the last I saw of that man, but to this day if I ever see someone a runnin' I get up and shout "Run Forest! Run!" like something just comes over me...' [There seems to be more writing but the rest of the paper is shredded]
translation: 上面写着“今天我遇到了一个人，他告诉我他的名字叫弗雷斯特。他说得很好笑，我们刚认识一群骑自行车的人就过来了，他就开始“跑步”。我不知道为什么，但我有种想大喊大叫的冲动，所以我就这么做了。我大叫“快跑森林！快跑！”在我肺的顶端。就在那时，当我大喊一声之后，我看到他们中的一个掏出一把步枪，朝他的右屁股开枪，我听到他大喊：“有个‘笨蛋’跳起来咬了我！”。那是我最后一次见到那个人，但直到今天，如果我看到有人在奔跑，我就会站起来大喊“快跑森林！快跑！”好像有什么东西从我身上掠过……'[好像有更多的文字，但剩下的纸都被撕碎了]
context:
ID: undefined
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/More_Survivor_Notes/snippets.json
类型为 snippet

original: It seems to be a diary entry. It reads 'When I joined the army I had to get up on this a-bus, I walked up to the driver and said "My name'sa Forrest Gump!". He said to me in a loud voice, "Nobody gives a hunky shit who you are, pus ball. You're not even a low-life, scum-sucking maggot. Get your ass on the bus, you're in the army now!" He was a nice man, he always yelled a lot thoug.'
translation: 这看起来是一段日记。上面写着“当我入伍的时候，我不得不乘坐这辆a型巴士，我走到司机跟前说:‘我叫阿甘！’他大声回答我说:‘没人在乎你是谁，混蛋。你甚至不如一个低贱的、寄生在废人身上的蛆。快上他妈车，你现在加入军队了！’他是个好人，总是大喊大叫。”
